listing.listing_description: Designer furnishings and a thoughtful layout inside Hualalai Resort Haliipua Villa 104 rival the fairway and ocean views outside. Set in a prime central location within the resort, this villa offers easy access to shared luxury amenities, plus beaches, golf and more a short drive away. Reserve this three-bedroom Big Island vacation rental for a laid-back getaway with friends or an island holiday with extended family.Guests of the Haliipua Villas are welcome to use the resort’s shared pool, golf course, fitness center and spa. Start your day with a cup of local java from the Hualalai Coffee Company, gain insight into Hawaiian traditions at the cultural center or explore your surroundings in the ocean activities program; it’s easy to reach everything in one of the villa’s two included golf carts. Finish the day with dinner from the barbecue on the private lanai, followed by a movie in the villa’s media room.The villa is laid out around an upper-level great room with an open-plan living and dining area and fully equipped kitchen. Details like a vaulted ceiling and natural-fiber area rugs give the space a breezy appeal that’s only increased by a fold-away glass wall opening to the lanai. There’s also a family room on the lower level that opens to a landscaped courtyard with a tranquil water feature.All three bedrooms at Haliipua Villa 104 have ensuite bathrooms. There are two bedrooms with alfresco showers and their own terraces: one with a king bed that overlooks the ocean, and one with a queen bed and mountain vistas. The third bedroom has two twin beds, its own terrace and ocean views.For a honeymoon-style stroll along white sand or to play in the waves, make the 1-mile walk or golf-cart ride from the villa to the beach at the Four Seasons Hualalai. If you’ve rented a car, it’s also a short drive to even more beaches, a selection of golf courses, and dining and shopping in central Kailua-Kona.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-198-252-5440-01

listing.listing_description: Slow down to the pace of island life at the blissfully secluded Villa Tantangan. Set on more than two private acres at the end of a stretch of unpaved road, this one-of-a-kind Bali vacation rental feels like a stylish retreat at the edge of the planet. Spend a dreamy holiday or honeymoon listening to the waves wash over the black-sand beach just in front of the property—and the laughter of your loved ones.Your stay at the villa includes the services of a chef, housekeeper and villa manager, as well as a daily Indonesian or continental breakfast. Outdoor living areas with a pool, sun beds and plenty of loungers are tucked into lush gardens designed by renowned artist John Pettigrew, creating a beautiful contrast between the manicured grounds and the wild sea. Inside, you’ll find amenities such as a media room, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.Woven screens and slats of bamboo are all that separate the villa’s indoor living areas from the outdoor ones. Stretch out on generous sectionals that are the same shade of brilliant blue as the ocean or gather with friends and family at the dining table for six. Though chef service is included, the house does have a kitchen with a coffee press, juicer, rice cooker and more.This luxury property has one master bedroom with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, terrace, lounge area and its own entrance. The other two bedrooms have, respectively, two twin beds and an en-suite bathroom, and a king bed and access to a hall bathroom.From the villa’s beachfront location in the Tabanan area, it’s a short drive to the famed Tanah Lot Temple, the golf course at the Pan Pacific Nirwana Bali, several popular beaches, and shopping, dining and nightlife in Kuta. Of course, you can also choose to remain at the villa and simply enjoy the gorgeous surroundings.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Amid the serene rice paddies of southwestern Bali and situated less than a mile from Berawa Beach is Villa Amy, one of only five elite Dea Villas Balinese vacation homes located on the island nation of Indonesia. Villa Amy is staffed by attentive professionals and can generously host up to six overnight guests with three private and amply sized sleeping quarters. Great for families with children or just a group of friends, Amy at Dea offers bucolic surroundings while remaining in proximity to many of Bali’s prized attractions.The villa really drives home the tropical motif with lava-stone steps surrounded by ponds, connecting the estate’s three separate pavilions. The living pavilion is open concept with ornate and majestic pillars making inhabitants feel a touch regal. A fully equipped kitchen awaits the knowing hands of the culinary genius in your entourage, but there is also a capable chef on staff ready to take charge if you just feel like kicking back.The guest suites have each been afforded the highest degree of privacy, as well as being ample in size and possessing amenities such as flat screen satellite televisions and security safes. The bedrooms have been adorned with fascinating Indonesian objets d’art and options for bedding include a king size or twin beds. Each room also boasts beautiful en-suite alfresco bathrooms with rain showers and stone tubs carved out of giant river rocks.Berawa Beach has black sands and powerful waves that make it less than ideal for swimming, though the area is highly prized by surfers from around the world. Anyone can pick up surfing in Berawa, as there are plenty of stores renting or selling Balinese and international brand surfboards, as well as friendly instructors providing lessons to anyone, regardless of experience. Restaurants line these surfer havens, offering delicious libations as well as a mix of Indonesian and Western cuisine. Come experience a dream vacation in Bali with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Zenissima Estate offers resort-style luxury in total privacy just 10 minutes from Seminyak Square in Southern Bali. Consisting of 3 distinct villas (each with a private swimming pool, living/dining area, gourmet kitchen, and 4 bedroom suites), the estate is a perfect choice for large family reunions, destination wedding guest, or inspiring retreats with colleagues or friends. Myriad adventures and destinations are within easy reach, including the family-friendly Finn’s Recreation Club and several beaches with world-famous surf breaks.Each of the villas has a similar layout, distinguished by deft touches of unique decor. Sun loungers on the deck or semi-submerged on a “Baja shelf” inspire long days in the Balinese sun, while canopied beds and sitting areas welcome cool relaxation in the soothing shade. The main living/entertainment area of each villa features an open-concept, semi-alfresco layout with kitchen, bar, and dining table. Throughout the estate, the superb collection of artwork evokes both the ancient traditions and unique contemporary ambiance of Bali (including 2 spectacular pairs of Bodhisattvas in turquoise and fuschia). The staff will elevate your experience at Zenissima, including security, butler services, and cook services.Beyond this self-contained oasis, the opportunities for adventure and discovery are endless. Conquer the surf breaks at Seminyak and Kuta Beach; fly down the waterslides at Finn’s Recreation Club; or experience the profound richness of Balinese culture at Tanah Lot Temple. Venture about 10 minutes for excellent shopping, dining, and nightlife in Seminyak Town, or delight in the colorful splendors of Bali Bird Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Designed as a family and friends vacation retreat, Villa Sapi has everything needed for a dream vacation. Enjoy all the comfort and service of a 5 stars hotel, and the feeling of intimacy that only a private house can deliver. Villa Sapi consists of two different structures surrounded by decorative fishponds and gardens flowing all the way down to a pristine white beach.Almost every room provides panoramic views. The open-plan main room houses the living and dining areas below a lofty ceiling. Light pours in through an invisible wall giving you full appreciation of the tasteful furnishings and colorful, contemporary art. In the living area, a lounging area and soft armchairs with refined upholstery is the perfect setting in which to relax from a day at the beach. The elegant dining set is made of a lovely dark wood and beautifully finished. The gourmet kitchen features deluxe appliances, natural stone surfaces and local Indonesian art. As dusk settles, gather your guests around the covered dining table as your private chef prepares a feast.The main house acts as a sort of vortex, it's a place to gather, to chill out and enjoy friends and family, but above all it's a place to explore. The guesthouse is a wonderful modern Inner Sanctum. Independent and uniquely isolated from the main villa, it gives your guests the freedom and independence from others if they so desire.All five bedrooms are individually decorated with fine linens, beautiful furniture and every one features a stunning ocean view. Each bedroom includes a King size bed and an en-suite bathroom with alfresco shower and premium fixtures and fittings that would rival any spa. The Guesthouse, which houses two of the six bedrooms, has an additional private pool and alfresco dining area for its residents.Lombok, which is known as a more pristine and untouched Bali, offers visitors many unforgettable attractions. The Gili Islands located a short 5-minute boat ride from the villa are known for their scuba diving and snorkeling but also for relaxing, swimming and partying. The second biggest volcano of Indonesia, Mount Rinjani, is not to be missed. Visitors can book guided tours to get to the top and see the Crater Lake. Hang with monkeys at the Pusuk Monkey Forest and take in the beautiful mountainous landscape. Lombok won’t leave you disappointed.Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: You’ll be sure to leave the hustle and bustle of everyday life behind you when you stay at this tranquil vacation home. Surrounded by mature trees and lush tropical greenery, this estate offers plenty of space to relax in private, making it one of our top Bali villas for a group of couples. A top tropical holiday destination, the island of Bali offers a welcoming atmosphere, unique culture and stunning beaches.Relax in the sun on one of the cushioned chaise lounges that surround the 12-meter, greenstone swimming pool. Later, enjoy a massage in one of the relaxation balés or sit with a glass of wine and breathe in the tropical air in the garden living area. Included with your stay are the services of a chef and a housekeeper, ensuring you won’t have to lift a finger.The heart of the villa is its open-sided thatched roof dining pavilion that features a solid wood dining table on a polished concrete floor; beside it you’ll find a casual living area with rattan sofas. Meals are prepped in the fully equipped kitchen that also includes a service bar. And if you’re looking for a communal space to unwind with a movie, there’s a second, open-sided pavilion with sofas that face a satellite television and DVD player.This property offers six stand-alone bedrooms, allowing up to 12 guests to spend the night here and experience plenty of privacy. All suites have king size beds and en-suite bathrooms with rain showers as well as televisions and patios, while three rooms also include access to plunge pools.You’re just 8 km to Echo Beach when you stay here—this spot is ideal for surfing and is known for its dark, volcanic sands. Meanwhile, the high-end boutiques, trendy restaurants and vibrant club spots of Seminyak are just 16 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Peaceful and serene, this beautiful lakefront property is surrounded by mountain views, lush lawns, and private walking trails that wind through the wetlands of Queenstown, New Zealand. WIth four full-size bedrooms and one kid's bunk room, Omaio is perfect for secluded family getaways. Equipped with a private tennis court and petanque pitch, Omaio is ideal for travelers who like to maintain an active lifestyle. Within a short drive of the villa, you ’ll find golf, skiing, Queenstown’s bustling city center, and more.Taking full advantage of its three-hundred-sixty-degree mountain views, Omaio’s floorplan stretches lengthwise, allowing each of its bedrooms and the open concept living area to access the breathtaking vista and outdoor spaces. At its center, an imposing stone fireplace sets the perfect tone for an elegant dinner soiree or a cozy night in with the family. High-end designer furnishings and electronics decorate the spacious main room that contains the fireplace lounge, formal dining area, and state of the art kitchen. Outside, you’ll love relaxing by the gas fireplace and dining alfresco on warmer evenings.Omaio comes with a fully equipped kitchen, gas barbeque, dishwasher, and formal dining with seating for ten. After dinner, move the party to the living room, where the entertainer in your group can provide the background music on the piano. When it’s time for bed, Omaio’s three en-suite bedrooms and two multi-bed suites all feature direct access to private terraces and soaring mountain views.The Queenstown area is full of exciting attractions no matter what time you’re visiting New Zealand. If there’s a golfer in the group, Queenstown Golf Course is a great way to enjoy the dynamic landscape of New Zealand while you challenge yourself to a round. The Wakatipu Yacht Club is a beautiful area for a stroll, private yacht rental, or a fishing charter. And, Main Street in Queenstown is where you’ll find the most shopping, dining, and nightlife options. If you’re on the island to ski, Coronet Peak and The Remarkables are both under thirty-kilometers from home.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Como Park greenery waves in the surface of the infinity plunge pool at this sleek modern retreat just outside Melbourne. It’s beautifully designed—all open-plan spaces, glass walls, and polished concrete floors—but has a sense of humor that shows up in the built-in trampoline. Let loose in the park or take the tram to central Melbourne to visit its museums, gardens, and world-class coffee shops.Tree-shaded decks make the park feel like your own private backyard. Turn flips on the trampoline, cool off in the plunge pool, serve dinner from the barbecue at the alfresco table for 6, and watch the stars come out from around the outdoor fireplace. On cooler evenings, find the wine cooler, fireplace, Apple TV, sound system, and Wi-Fi inside.Cool tones of gray and white bring a serene feel to the open-concept great room, while a timber-paneled ceiling, sun-splashed glass wall, and copper fireplace have the warmth to balance it out. The sitting area has an inviting sectional, the dining table seats 8, and the fully equipped kitchen has a breakfast bar.This vacation rental has 3 bedrooms with queen beds: 2 with ensuite bathrooms, including the master bedroom, and one that shares a bathroom with the fourth bedroom, which has 2 twin beds. The shared-bathroom setup makes it ideal for a family on holiday with younger children.With Como Park next door, you have the luxury of popping over for a stroll with your morning coffee or an evening constitutional. Walk to nearby Como House and Garden for a peek into the Australia of the 1850s, and into Toorak for shopping and dining. Join locals—including a clutch of resident penguins—at St Kilda Beach, and take the tram from South Yarra into central Melbourne for everything from a perfectly poured latte to a honeymoon-worthy multi-course dinner.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The perfect villa for an unforgettable golf trip, this Big Island two-bedroom is right on the edge of the Four Season’s Hualalai Golf Course. Whether you’re visiting with family, friends, colleagues, or for your honeymoon, Fairway Villa has an incredible atmosphere for any occasion. During your stay, you’ll have full access to the shared amenities of the Four Seasons resort (for an additional fee), and a golf cart to help you navigate its coastal estate. Within a few minutes' walk, you'll find the beach, golf course, shops, restaurants, and resort facilities.Decorated with warm Hawaiian wood tones, vibrant floral patterns, and rich granite, this golf villa will have you feeling at one with the Big island’s beautiful environment in no time. Fairway’s open concept floor plan and large doorways to the patio create a spacious open-air feel inside, as well as allowing the ocean breeze to flow freely within. In the living room, you’ll appreciate the high-end electronics, sound system, and satellite television as you sink into plush designer furniture after a long day on the golf course. At dinner, the fully-equipped kitchen offers state of the art appliances, and plenty of functional working space.Outside, the alfresco dining area is the perfect spot to watch fellow golfers enjoy the course, while you sip your favorite cocktail. If you feel like exploring the Four Season’s Resort, hop into the supplied golf cart and venture on to discover their swimming pool, spa, beachfront, sports club, and cabana areas. There are also plenty of activities for children at the Kids Club and Ocean Activity Centre.For even more shopping and dining options, travel fifteen minutes to the Waikoloa Beach Resort, where you’ll enjoy a wide selection of international cuisine and everything from handcrafted souvenirs to high-end fashion outlets. And, to experience some authentic Hawaiian city life, the town of Kona is just twenty minutes from the resort.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: W41383633-01

listing.listing_description: If anywhere epitomizes the authentic ‘Bali style’ that has enraptured so many over the past decades, it is Villa Batujimbar – a treasure-filled travel destination in itself. This sublime property, which sits on over an acre of beachfront land, was originally the home of long-time Bali resident and Australian artist Donald Friend who, in 1970, invited Sri Lankan ‘tropical modernism’ architect Geoffrey Bawa – celebrated for breaking down barriers and creating harmonious relationships between buildings and landscape – to collaborate in developing the beachfront estate. The Balinese palaces at Amlapura and Klungkung plus the famed water gardens of Tirta Gangga influenced his ideas – clearly expressed in the two-storey moat-encircled Lembu Bale that commands centre stage within the meticulously designed gardens.The lower gallery of the Lembu Bale houses the current Australian owner’s astonishing collection of Balinese art – including the Donald Friend painting he bought from the artist himself on first visiting Villa Batujimbar in 1972. This private collection rivals the island’s finest galleries and museums and is a unique feature of the villa. Guests are welcome to view the collection on special request. Yet art is not confined to this space alone throughout the living and sleeping pavilions you’ll come across architectural treasures, rare artefacts, painted antique doors and windows, and heirloom paintings that reveal the owner’s passion for Balinese art and craftsmanship. And within the expansive gardens are myriad moss-encrusted statuary and intricately carved stone reliefs. Bali’s beauty shines in the materials used too – vaulted alang-alang thatched roofs, lava stone steps, coral walls, and terrazzo and teakwood floors.With such a fascinating history, no wonder Villa Batujimbar has attracted celebrity guests over the years. Today’s guests are following in the footsteps of Mick Jagger and Jerry Hall (who got married here), Sting (who gave an impromptu concert), Yoko Ono, and members of the Thai and Malaysian and British royal families. In such splendid surroundings, and pampered by a team of staff that includes a private chef, personal butlers and villa manager, you can look forward to royal treatment too.Influenced by traditional Balinese family living, Villa Batujimbar comprises a series of alang-alang thatched pavilions spread through the substantial estate. At its centre is the Lembu Bale – a moated double-storey brick-built pavilion which houses an open-sided lounge on its upper floor looking onto the swimming pool on one side and across the gardens to the ocean on the other.Closest to the beach are the living pavilion and the dining bale, and to one side is the Longhouse, comprising two bedroom suites, a formal dining room and professionally equipped kitchen. Opposite is the Bali Pavilion, with two bedrooms, garden bathrooms and courtyard. Furthest from the beach, two more guest bedroom suites occupy the two-storey Pool Pavilion and share an open-fronted living area looking onto the 20-metre swimming pool. Two additional bedrooms are housed in the Family Pavilion situated above the exercise room near the villa entrance, while a tennis court and shower room lie just across the driveway

listing.listing_description: Clean-lined contemporary architecture and towering palms are reflected back in the glass-like pool at this fully staffed modern complex in Canggu. Open-sided living areas invite the warm breezes indoors, and a stuffed-animal shelf welcomes kids. It’s a 3-minute drive to Echo Beach Club for grilled lobster and organic salads in an oceanfront setting, and 8 minutes to cafe-lined Batu Bolong Beach. The villa’s private courtyard is dominated by a huge pool, but also features plenty of loungers, an al-fresco living area, and a semi-outdoor kitchen. Stretch out on the indoor exercise equipment, flip on the Apple TV, or pour a glass from the wine fridge to sip as you scroll via Wi-Fi. Your holiday at this vacation rental begins with an airport transfer and welcome drink, and includes daily Indonesian breakfast. Teak ceilings and floors lend warm natural texture to the open-sided living and dining areas, while red details add pops of color. The look continues in the fully equipped kitchen, whose glossy black surfaces are broken up by red accents. This luxury villa has six bedrooms that are honeymoon-worthy escapes with king beds and their own entrances, as well as one bedroom with two twin beds. The children’s room has two twin bunk beds and a play area. All eight bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning for the warmest nights in the hot, humid Kabupaten Badung climate. If you’re traveling with the whole family, treat the kids to a day at nearby Taman Segura Madu Water Park and dinner at Echo Beach Club, which has a kids menu. If not, try surfing at the break at popular Batu Bolong Beach and relive your honeymoon on a sunset stroll at Berawa Beach. It’s all less than a 10-minute drive from the villa. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Welcome to Villa Cendrawasih, a palatial tropical estate stationed a few short steps from Batubelig Beach in Indonesia’s famed island of Bali. The villa borrows its name from a native bird best known for the flamboyant plumage belonging to the male of the species, which serves as an inspiration for the home’s prodigious design and decor. The villa offers accommodation for up to ten guests with five glamorous bedrooms, a full staff and plentiful amenities.The villa has a comprehensive and professional staff whose duties are to maintain the estate and to ensure guests enjoy their stay. Among them are four butlers, a gourmet chef, a housekeeper and a chauffeur with a car. The villa is replete with creature comforts including a vast swimming pool and a gym with the latest fitness equipment. One can easily lounge on the furnished terrace, surrounded by gardens and an idyllic Koi fish pod. Inside, the home boasts a multitude of entertainment devices and a security safe to ensure peace of mind.The interior of Villa Cendrawasih is defined by contemporary decor, with high white walls, smooth stone floors, glistening timber panels and inspirational impressionist art. The main living area has been equipped with comfortable seating and native Indonesian objets d’art. A dining room with an elegant and long candlelit table, promotes an unmistakable air of sophistication to be appreciated over the chef’s gourmet meals.Villa Cendrawasih’s five en-suite bedrooms feature plush beds and tons of amenities. Rooms either have king beds or two twin beds, which can pushed together to form a king if so desired. The bedrooms also feature convenient direct access to balconies, gardens and the rooftop or ground-floor terrace. Additionally, each room has a personal television, climate control and large closets, leaving guests utterly satisfied.If you’ve come to Bali to shop for rare and exotic items, nearby Legian Street is the place to be. The street is literally lined with fashion boutiques and art shops where haggling is part of the local custom. Bali is also a sacred place, home to countless temples which are visited by steadfast though friendly pilgrims who invite newcomers to learn and participate in some of their customs. Tanah Lot Temple is one such site, situated offshore atop an outcrop, and is one of Bali’s most dazzling iconic sites.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This sensational villa is located within Hualalai Resort on the Big Island of Hawaii, an easy walk from the beachfront Four Seasons. Perhaps the finest property bordering the resort's golf course, the 6,300-square-foot home offers expansive outdoor living areas, spacious and elegant interiors, and panoramic views of the lush fairways, Pacific Ocean, and Hawaiian sunset. Five bedrooms include four large king suites (one of which is located in a separate cottage), making Hualalai Estates an ideal vacation rental for family reunions, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up ten in size.Framed in rich gardens and volcanic rock, the villa harmonizes gracefully with the stunning landscape and sea. Plunge into the refreshing infinite pool and revel in the sunlight on the tanning shelf. Enjoy refreshments in the shade of the lanai and afternoon meals from the barbecue. Kindle the fire pit in the evening breeze and dip into the hot tub under the stars.Wide, cornerless walls create a seamless, indoor-outdoor living area for relaxing in the ocean breeze, infusing the home's interiors with an alfresco ambiance. A gourmet-grade kitchen with beautiful wood cabinetry and a breakfast bar with superb rattan chairs overlooks the open-concept living and dining areas. The furnishings and decor conjure vintage Hawaiian elegance, enhanced by fine modern amenities for entertainment. Air conditioning and ceiling fans complement the enchanting breath of the Pacific.The bedrooms include four fabulous king suites and guestroom with two twin-size beds. The three main-house king suites and the cottage suite open to the villa's terrace, and all five rooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms and open-air showers like rain forest cascades. There are gorgeous stone bathtubs in the master bath and the primary guest bath, as well.Hualalai Estates provides exquisite privacy while placing you in the heart of one of he finest oceanfront resorts in the world, with amenities suited for guests of all ages. Take a lovely walk to the Four Seasons to enjoy its beach, fine restaurants, and extraordinary wellness amenities. Play championship golf at Hualalai or nearby Mauna Lani, and treat yourself to authentic Hawaiian treatments at the spa. Enjoy the fine coffee and vintage soda fountain at Hualalalai Trading Company or an oceanfront meal at Beach Tree.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: 20111291796

listing.listing_description: Walk barefoot from this oceanside villa to the sands of Broken Head, a favorite beach for families and surfers in the Byron Bay region. Take the villa’s surfboard and conquer one of the top point-breaks in the world. Then return for poolside lounging and home-cooked feasts amid the sounds of kookaburra birds and the rhythmic sea.This contemporary oasis emphasizes the lush natural beauty of Australia’s easternmost edge. Designed and built around 3 age-old pine trees, it features ample outdoor living areas and broad doorways that breathe the dune-softened air. Enjoy a workout in the 20-meter lap pool or simply relax in the shallow lounge pool under the open sky. Make the most of the villa’s bicycles and paddle board, or curl up with a favorite book in the dappled afternoon shade. Kindle the barbecue in the evening and relish an alfresco meal with a bottle of Australian wine. The Northern Rivers region of New South Wales has something for everyone, from its extraordinary beaches, to the restaurants and cafes of Byron Bay town, to the history and panoramic views of Byron Bay Lighthouse. If you’ve never surfed before, this is definitely the place to try a first lesson, while skydiving and deep-sea fishing also beckon to thrill-seeking travelers. Explore the bohemian enclave of Nimbin and visit one of the area’s artisan and farmers markets. Nature-lovers will want to visit Broken Head Nature Reserve, Arakwal National Park, and the Cape Bay Walking Track.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A pergola-topped deck and glassed-in great room command lake and mountain views from this modern retreat on 58 private acres at the heart of New Zealand’s North Island. Stretch out in a sun-dappled lap pool or soak in bathtubs hidden behind fern fronds. Or take advantage of the short drive to outdoor activities around Taupo and hike forested trails, cycle around the lake, and fish for local trout. Look down on Lake Taupo’s Mine Bay from outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue, then finish the day with a session in the al-fresco hot tub or in front of the indoor gas fireplace, sound system, and Wi-Fi. An espresso machine will fuel all your holiday adventures, and laundry facilities will help you start with fresh gear. Fold back the glass walls on three sides of the great room to enjoy the luxury of one seamless indoor-outdoor living area. Wicker sofas and farmhouse-style ladderback chairs lend a rustic feel to the living and dining areas, while a vaulted ceiling gives the fully equipped kitchen a bright, airy appeal. The two private bedrooms at this vacation rental are set on either side of the great room. Each one has a king bed, en-suite bathroom with a honeymoon-suite-worthy glassed-in tub, and access to a shared terrace; the master also has lake views. The Point Villa Tatamoana is a 1-minute drive from the massive Taupo Maori carving, which towers over Mine Bay, and a short drive from Huka Falls, where Lake Taupo spills over in a rush of blue water. There are plenty of hiking and cycling routes in the area, or you can drive to downtown Taupo for a family dinner or a tasting at a local winery with friends. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Drift across the pool, tropical greenery and blue skies overhead, as you lose yourself in the tranquility of this airy Balinese villa. Watch the sunset over the rice fields from the rooftop patio, take a yoga class in the gazebo, and catch up on some reading in the garden. Treetop tours and elephant safaris are easily bookable, or you could rent a motorbike and do some exploring of your own.Practicing progressive minimalism, Villa Saba believes a clutter-free environment will result in a clutter-free mind. From the terrazzo floors inside to the wood decking on the terrace, you’ll flow as freely as the breeze, and it’s all lit with warm natural light. Lush vegetation, water features, and Balinese art set the tone for relaxing days and exciting nights. Let your inner mixologist shine.Start your morning off with a quick meditation session on the planks of the water garden. Sip your morning Espresso on the rooftop patio, greeting the sun as it rises over neighboring farmer’s fields. At night, light up the fire pit, turn up the sound system and grill up something fresh from a local market on Saba’s barbeque. And, make sure to pick the perfect pairing from the wine fridge.After a morning on Greg Norman’s Nirwana Bali Golf Course, celebrate your score over lunch 10 minutes from home in Seminyak Square. In the peak of the afternoon heat, head for Waterbom Bali Waterslides and let the kids run wild while you sip a cold beer at the poolside bar. Then, dance in the sand at Ku De Ta Beach Club while the sun sets over the ocean.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to a self-contained paradise in Bali at The Pala at Pandawa. This six-bedroom luxury property in the Bukit is the flagship villa of Pandawa Cliff Estate. Its oceanfront setting and full staff make it the perfect tropical hideaway, but it can also be reserved with neighboring villa The Rose as a stunning location for a family reunion, special celebration or destination wedding.Your holiday at The Pala includes the services of a private chef, housekeeper, butler and driver, as well as the use of the shared gym, spa, and tennis and squash courts at Pandawa Cliff Estate. Make the lush garden and stone amphitheater the backdrop to a wedding ceremony, or take advantage of the infinity pool, daybeds, al-fresco dining area and balé to simply relax. Grown-ups will appreciate the house’s Wi-Fi, while kids will enjoy the games room with Nintendo Wii.Inside the villa, living and dining areas on two levels make the most of the ocean views, and slide-away glass walls invite the warm breezes in. Throughout the villa, sleek details like polished stone floors and clean-lined furnishings are balanced by traditional touches such as carved furniture and painted ceilings. While there is a fully equipped kitchen, the private chef will be happy to prepare breakfast and other meals from a menu.All six bedrooms at this vacation rental have king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and many have honeymoon-suite-inspired features such as living areas and al-fresco showers. Three of the bedrooms have king beds that can be separated into two twin beds if needed.From The Pala’s perch above the ocean, it’s a short drive to the white sands of Pandawa Beach, the restaurants and nightlife in the town of Nusa Dua and the fairways of the New Kuta Golf Club. For a day trip, check out the incredible scenery and learn about local legends at the sea temple at Uluwatu.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to a luxury hideaway in the Bali jungle at Villa Ka. This private paradise is tucked into the landscape around Badung and offers a peaceful—and fully staffed—haven for up to ten guests. Reserve its five bedrooms to reconnect with friends and family in a resort-worthy setting that’s close to beaches and sights but removed from the bustle of the island’s popular south coast.Your holiday at Villa Ka includes the services of a chef, butler, housekeeper, security guard and more. Revel in the balmy weather in the swimming pool, read and nap on the loungers, heat up the barbecue for an al-fresco dinner or serve refreshments from the indoor wet bar and wine cooler. While the villa feels removed from the everyday, it has a media room, sound system, TV and Wi-Fi.The living areas at this unique vacation rental are laid out across several pavilions dotting the garden-like grounds. Thatched roofs, open sides and traditional carved furniture add to the charms of the main living and dining rooms. While chef service is included as part of your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen with amenities like a coffee press and water dispenser.Each bedroom is a honeymoon-worthy retreat within the property boasting a queen bed and en-suite bathroom. While the bedrooms themselves have air conditioning and ceiling fans for your comfort, the bathrooms are al-fresco, letting you listen to the birdsong and luxuriate in the warm breezes while you take a bath or shower.In spite of the villa’s secluded feel, it’s a short drive from dining, shopping and entertainment in downtown Seminyak and North Kuta. For a beach day, catch the surf at Batu Belig Beach or watch the sunset from the sands of Kayu Putih Beach or Double Six Beach while sipping a cocktail.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Indulge your inner child in a luxury setting at Mamole Tree House. Though this unique vacation rental is whimsical, it doesn’t lack for five-star amenities, making it perfect for everything from a family holiday to an adventurous honeymoon. Given the stunning ocean views, private beach and nearly 600 acres of land surrounding the tree house and Nihi Sumba Resort, it’s easy to see why it was ranked the number one hotel in the world by Travel + Leisure in 2016.Your stay includes in-villa dining for three daily meals, non-alcoholic beverages and butler service. Resort staff will be happy to help you arrange a complimentary outing to a nearby island, a stand-up paddleboarding or snorkeling session, a mountain bike ride or a visit to a local village. You can also choose to enjoy a quiet swim in the tree house’s infinity pool, followed by a stint on the beachfront loungers and sunbeds or a meal at the al-fresco dining area.Though a hideaway in the sky may be the stuff of childhood dreams, Mamole Tree House boasts sophisticated modern style. The villa is divided into two circular houses, connected by a bamboo bridge. Inside the ground-floor living areas, you’ll find one-of-a-kind pieces like traditional Sumbanese carvings, antiques made of local wood and handicrafts such as vibrant ikat prints. And unlike most playhouses, this tree house has air conditioning, a minibar and Wi-Fi.Mamole Tree House has three bedrooms nestled into the foliage, each with a king bed, lounge area and en-suite bathroom. Listen to the leaves rustle as you fall asleep, and wake up to ocean views from the private balconies. In an especially exotic touch, some of the bathrooms are in separate pavilions, connected to the bedrooms by a bridge.The villa may feel like it’s miles from the real world, but it’s just a short walk from the amenities at Nihi Sumba, from the boathouse and beach club to the restaurants and bars. Surf the waves just off the shore from the resort, follow a local guide on a horseback ride or book a treatment at the spa. But you’ll want to spend most of your time close to the ocean; East Nusa Tenggara is known for its gorgeous beaches and tempting blue waters, and the 1.5-mile stretch at Nihiwatu is no exception.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Gorgeous Fairway Villa 104D is part of the inimitable Hualalai Resort, where everything is on hand for your perfect Hawaiian escape.Your private two bedroom villa commands an impressive upper level view of the 15th tee of the Hualalai Golf Course while beyond you can admire Mauna Kea, Island of Maui and horizon views of the ocean. Designed by Honolulu-based Architect, Warren Sunnland, your spacious and modern villa is accented with local artwork and wood fittings. Vaulted ceilings make for airy spaces, while sliding doors allow you to easily let the outside in or step out to enjoy the exceptional Hawaiian climate. Everything is here to make your stay relaxing and includes a fully equipped gourmet kitchen with breakfast bar and dining area with seating for four guests. Your inviting and luxurious living space includes Television and DVD player, Wi-Fi, air conditioning and washer/dryer. Outside you’ll discover the private lanai entertaining area where you can enjoy alfresco dining and barbecue any time of the day while taking in spectacular views. There are also one golf cart for your exclusive use and a single garage.Perfectly positioned to make the most of the superb Hualalai Resort facilities, it’s ideal for families with young children who may still be in the napping stage! You can easily check on them while you relax on your private lanai. In addition to the variety of pools you can choose from, you’ll enjoy the closeness of the villa to the Waiulu Community Pool - just cross the driveway for a refreshing late-afternoon dip.Your comfortable and luxurious bedding configuration features a Master with king bed and deluxe ensuite with both a tub and shower. Your second bedroom is conveniently fitted with twin beds and also features its own private en-suite. Both of these charming rooms include ceiling fans and air conditioning.The Fairway Villas at Hualalai are located within walking distance from the Hualalai Trading Company, Sports Club & Spa, Hualalai Golf Course, Coffee Company and spectacular Four Seasons Resort Hotel. Nearby you’ll find a convenience market, shopping, tennis court, golf course and fitness facility. It is a 22 minute drive to Kona town and a 3 minute walk to Hualalai Resort Beach. Kona International Airport (KOA) is just 12 minutes’ drive away.This property is compliant with Hawaii State Legislation (HB2078) for vacation rental accommodations, Lic#W92294683-1.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Set in the rolling Brynderwyn Range, this hilltop mansion offers a unique combination of sustainable living and countryside luxury. Guests can wander the themed halls and gorgeously-outfitted rooms, before taking in glorious views of the grounds and gardens. Experience a sunrise yoga session, swim in the serene pool, or soak up the rays in a recliner, before hitting the nearby beach or trailhead.Triumphant, panoramic views welcome new arrivals to Te Arai lodge, with the special aura of this home apparent as soon as the impressive stone facade comes into view. The rich North island heritage of the home is clear, from the ornate ferns hanging over the welcoming dining area, to the indigineous woodland that hugs that pathways around the home. After a session in the exercise room or luxurious steam in the sauna, wander through the crisp air of the home’s garden patches to take in the true scale and grandeur of this home.From Te Arai, guests can truly experience the natural wealth of this part of New Zealand. Just a short drive away is one of the North Island’s most scenic beaches, Te Arai; ideal for swimming, surfing and horse riding. Excellent hiking and scenic picnics are nearby at the picturesque Tawharanui reserve, while guests can make a surprising short drive to reach the bright lights of Auckland, just down the coast. In the evening, the saltwater pool and barbecue of the villa awaits your return, with delicious garden-to-table vegetables grown in the estate grounds.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This superb Wailea Beach villa is a short walk from the resort's beach and pools and offers 2,300 square feet of beautifully furnished living space. Two ample king suites and outstanding amenities for cooking and entertainment form an ideal haven for two couples, while additional bedding can accommodate children or friends. The vacation rental includes access to the resort's pools, fitness center, business center, and activities area, while the myriad splendors of Wailea and Makena surround you.Located on the fourth floor of a five-story building, the villa enjoys expansive views of the Pacific Ocean and the legendary Maui sunset. A spacious lanai invites you to relish alfresco meals from the barbeque and savor cool refreshments in the ocean breeze. Glass doors open to a spacious, open-concept interior, where the fully equipped kitchen serves a breakfast bar, both dining tables, and an adjoining den. An ample salon includes a lovely white sectional and two leather armchairs, ideal for movie-watching at night or simply enjoying the vistas through picture windows. Natural wood accents and fine original artwork harmonize with the sublime beauty of this incomparable island.Both of the villa's bedrooms feature king-size beds and ensuite bathrooms. The larger master suite also includes a walk-in closet, and there is a soaking tub in its bathroom. The den beside the living area features a pullout sofa and pocket doors, forming an extra sleeping room. The understated yet gorgeous décor of the bedrooms summons rustic Maui, providing peaceful sanctuaries for downtime and rest.The villa is perfectly placed for enjoying the riches of Maui's leeward coast. You're a short walk from Wailea Beach, the Shops at Wailea, and the resort's oceanfront pools (which include an adult pool and a kid-friendly family pool), while a dozen other spectacular beaches await you in the area of Wailea and Makena, including Keawakapu Beach. Golfers are within minutes of Wailea Golf Club and Makena Golf Course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Hold an unforgettable event at Kaba Kaba Estate. Set on three acres of lush grounds in Tabanan, this luxurious and private villa offers hotel-worthy amenities, not to mention a full staff. Eight bedrooms, three pools, a spa, and a location outside Seminyak make this property perfect for a wedding, reunion or anniversary party or just a tropical family getaway.Nestled into rice paddies, Kaba Kaba Estate is a quiet oasis on Bali. Have a swim in the large pool, which looks out on a palm-dotted lawn, or in one of the plunge pools. Relax in a lounge chair on the pool deck, bliss out at the spa, enjoy a book or movie in the library and media room or work out at the property’s tennis court or gym. The villa has Wi-Fi access, or you can ask the staff any questions.The villa is decorated in dramatic Balinese style, with sliding glass walls that instantly turn indoor living spaces into outdoor ones. The open-plan living and dining area offers plenty of seating on long white sectionals, with cushions adding a pop of colour. A vaulted ceiling and wood paneling in the library feel traditional yet airy, and a metallic ceiling, Persian-style rug and velour upholstery create an intimate atmosphere in the media room. For your convenience, there’s a fully equipped kitchen.The eight bedrooms at Kaba Kaba Estate have king beds, en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and gorgeous views of the lawn. Four-poster beds draped with curtains have a romantic feel, and a mix of contemporary and antique pieces gives each bedroom a unique look. In the bathrooms, glassed-in showers and large tubs invite you to relax.From the villa, it’s 5 km to the Nirwana Bali Golf Club, just under 6 km to Tanah Lot Sea Temple, 11 km to Seseh Beach, 15 km to Echo Beach and about 17 km to Finns Recreation Club. Seminyak is 24 km away, Kuta is about 25 km away, Waterbom Park is 26 km away, and Ngurah Rai International Airport is 30 km away. Further afield, you’ll find Mount Batukaru, 35 km away, Ubud, 37 km away, and the Elephant Safari Park, 47 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Throw your worries to the trade winds at Fairways South #15. From its generous lanai to its panoramic ocean views, this Big Island vacation rental invites you to settle in and simply relax. And once you’ve had enough of that, stroll to a nearby beach or take advantage of the golf, tennis and spa facilities at the nearby Mauna Kea Resort.Watch the sun move across the golf course and sink into the Pacific from outdoor living areas with a pool, whirlpool, and a spacious covered lanai with living and dining furniture. Lush gardens and soothing water features add to the feeling of laid-back luxury—and Wi-Fi access makes it easy to share those vacation vibes with friends and family back at home.The villa’s open-concept great room is also open to the lanai, letting warm breezes waft over the sitting area and a gourmet kitchen with a welcoming breakfast bar. High ceilings add to the airy ambience, while palm prints and warm wood floors are classic Hawaiian touches that bring local charm to the space.Fairways South #15 has one bedroom with a king bed and one bedroom with two queen/double bunk beds in the main house, one bedroom with two queen beds that can be accessed through the garden, and one bedroom with a king bed in the guest house, for a couple seeking a honeymoon-style hideaway. All four bedrooms have private ensuite bathrooms.Guests are welcome to opt in to resort privileges at the Mauna Kea Resort at extra cost for access to the golf courses, oceanfront tennis courts, and spa and fitness facilities during your holiday. For shopping and dining options beyond the resort, make the 5-minute drive to the town of Kawaihae or the 15-minute drive to Kamuela.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: W26732517-01

listing.listing_description: Feel the breeze at this open-air, mid-century, modern home up the coast from Brisbane in Noosa. Stretch out on the sofa and enjoy garden views to either side. Lay back in a sun lounger and work on your tan while the kids splash in the pool. At night, fire up the barbecue and grill something fresh for dinner. If you’re in the mood to dine-out, check out the restaurants in downtown Noosaville. Doonan Glasshouse is set amongst lush lawns on a gentle down-slope leading towards mature trees. The house is an architect’s dream, combining a few simple ingredients to create something extraordinary. Atop a pristine slab of white concrete, floor-to-ceiling windows outline the Glasshouse’s perimeter, opening to scenic views on both sides. The interior is clean and modern, decorated with mid-century furnishings to add a natural, retro feel. After dinner, gather around the fireplace to plan out the rest of your evening. On nights-in, take a bottle of wine to the furnished pool lounge and watch the sunset. On quieter evenings, curl up in the media room for a movie.The Sunshine Coast is home to a wide range of vacation activities, with everything from scuba diving to lavish afternoons at the spa. Start your mornings with a soothing stroll along Noosa Mains, Sunrise, or Yaroomba Beach. If golf is more your style, hit the links at Noosa Valley, Cooroy Mountain, or Peregian Golf Club. Later, check out the bustling craft beer scene on the waterfront of Noosa Heads. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Windu Asri is an astonishing luxury villa on the southwest coast of the island of Bali. Situated just a ten-minute walk from Legian Beach and within minutes of Seminyak Square and Jalan Petitenget, the villa balances prime location with exquisite, cloistered privacy. Open-air living areas and six gorgeous bedroom suites evoke the splendor of centuries past, while contemporary amenities and deluxe services including a private chef and butler ensure total comfort. The villa can be rented alone or as part of the larger Windu Estate—an excellent choice for destination wedding guests or large family reunions.The majestic villa invites you to enchanting days and evenings in the South Pacific light and air, with its ample, central swimming pool framed by beautiful furnished verandas and pavilions. The primary pavilion features an alfresco great room with soaring, vaulted ceilings of rich wood, an ample lounge area with sumptuous furnishings, and a superb dining table for twelve, ideal for relishing a barbeque meal prepared by the private chef.Indoors, the spaces and décor are deeply elegant and serene, with beautiful furnishings and objets d'art evoking blending classical and modern Indonesian style. Prepare cocktails at the bar and savor them in the lovely lounge area with television, and gather around the dining room table with glass doors opening to the pool. In the morning, refresh your body with a trip to the well-equipped exercise room.The villa features four fabulous king bedrooms and two guestrooms with two twin beds each (both convertible into kings), accommodating twelve guests in all. Each of the rooms opens to the villa's terrace and includes an ensuite bathroom with shower, television, safe, and air conditioning, among other deluxe features. The two primary king bedrooms additionally include stand-alone tubs in their bathrooms. The extraordinarily spacious and elegant bedrooms provide dreamy private settings for individuals and couples.Beyond the heavenly seclusion of Windu Asri, you'll enjoy outstanding proximity to the area of Petitenget. Seminyake Square is less than two kilometers from your door, while the dining and nightlife of Jalan Petitenget is just a minute's walk away. The renowned temple known as Pura Petitenget is also within minutes, and golfers are within easy reach of the Greg Norman-designed Nirwana Bali.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Windu Asri can be rented as part of a larger estate, Windu Estate (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/indonesia/bali/petitenget/windu-estate-114865).

listing.listing_description: Vaucluse is a suburb on the north-east peninsula of Sydney. With such quiet surroundings and privacy, you’d never guess that it’s just a six-minute walk to Parsley Bay Beach, and just ten-kilometers from downtown Sydney. It’s secluded atmosphere, and accommodations for twelve, are perfect for a family vacation or retreat with friends and colleagues. While you’re in Sydney, you’ll be located within minutes of so many of its world-famous attractions, making it easy to fall in love with this beautiful city.Decorated mainly in white, this luxury villa uses light wood accents to create a simplistic, yet-chic environment within its open concept interior. With designer furniture, high-end electronics, and a breezy beach-inspired decor, it’s easy to feel at home in Villa Vaucluse. The living room features a generous couch, the dining table has seating for twelve, and there several more lounge areas, making it easy for guests to find places for group gatherings or break-off for more intimate occasions.Outside, you’ll find several dining and lounge areas, both covered and open-air. Wi-Fi, cable television, air conditioning, a sound system, and washer/dryer are also included. And, the media room, billiard table, steam room, swimming pool, hot tub, ping pong table, and exercise room provide plenty of options for entertaining at home.The star of Sydney’s iconic skyline, The Sydney Opera House, is a must-see while you’re in town. The rooftop patio of The Glenmore has a panoramic view of the harbor, and it’s a great place to enjoy a few cocktails, and a delicious dinner while you check out the sights. After dinner, hit the town and explore Sydney’s vibrant nightlife scene around The Rocks and King Street Wharf. If you’re traveling with children, Macquarie Lighthouse, the Royal Botanic Garden, and Taronga Zoo are all great afternoon destinations. And, there are several more pristine beachfront areas within ten kilometers of home.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The Naupaka gated subdivision is adorned with historical fish ponds that wind their way through the coral walking path that leads to “A Bay.” Anaeho’omalu Bay is a picturesque shoreline with calm waters and a secluded atmosphere. Follow A Bay to the ocean, where you’ll love the pristine sandy beachfront of the Waikoloa Beach Resort’s generous estate. Walking, this trip takes about fifteen minutes. Back at home, you and your guests will love Island Star’s eight king bedrooms, game room, and beautiful terrace.Modern design meets beach chic within Island Star’s spacious, open concept interior. Elements like warm wood textures, local flora, and tropical print represent Hawaii’s gorgeous climate, while designer furniture, state of the art electronics, and stainless steel appliances provide the highest standard of modern luxury. Inside, the fully equipped kitchen is sure to inspire culinary creativity, and on the terrace, the bar with built-in barbecue will add even more fun to your meal prep.Island Star has plenty of ways to keep guests entertained, like the game room, where you’ll find a pool table and shuffleboard. There’s also satellite television, a sound system, and Wi-Fi inside. On the terrace, you’ll love cooling off in the swimming pool, and relaxing in the hot tub. Sun loungers are positioned all around the terrace, so it’s easy to find the perfect spot to work on your tan. There’s also a fire pit and tiki torches in the backyard, in case you feel like having your own Luau.Within a few miles of Waikoloa’s estate, you’ll find something fun for everyone in your group. If you’re traveling with children, swimming with Dolphins at Hawaii Dolphin Quest is an unforgettable experience. If there’s a golfer in the group, Francis H. Li Brown North, and South Golf Course is just six miles from home. There are several restaurants and bars in the area as well, one of the closest is the Tropics Ale House, featuring a huge selection of craft beers. And, larger cities, Kona and Waimea are both around thirty-miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: GE-194-744-3200-01

listing.listing_description: Balance resort-style luxury with total privacy at this dual-villa rental near Seminyak in Southern Bali. Part of Villa Zenissima Estate (a complex of 3 linked, 4-bedroom homes), the dual option is perfect for a pair of families or destination wedding guests seeking flexibility and space. Each of the houses features its own swimming pool, living/dining area, and gourmet kitchen, while the Zenissima staff includes butler and cook services as well as security.The villa’s style is a unique blend of age-old tradition and contemporary artistry, embodying the unique ambiance of today’s Bali. In one of the villas, a pair of fuschia Bodhisattvas presides over the pool, sure to elicit a smile of which the Buddha would approve. A “Baja shelf” with semi-submerged lounge chairs invites you to bask in the tropical sun before a dip in the water, while the terrace is ample enough for cocktail parties under the evening sky. In each house, the open kitchen is fully equipped with high-end appliances, serving a wide bar and semi-alfresco dining area.The Canggu and Seminyak areas of Southern Bali offer an extraordinary blend of natural beauty, family-friendly fun, and world-famous surf breaks. Bring your board to Seminyak Beach or Kuta Beach to catch a wave. Experience sublime colors and song at Bali Bird Park, or delve into Bali’s cultural majesty at Tanah Lot Temple. The town of Seminyak itself, about 10 minutes away, features some of the finest bars, restaurants, and cafes around; be sure to try a cup of Revolver coffee, and grab a cocktail and ocean-view seat at Ku De Ta.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The Glass House is an apartment in the Paddington neighborhood of downtown Sydney. With design by Nina Maya Interiors in collaboration with local suppliers, this contemporary masterwork offers an experience of this Australian metropolis while placing you within minutes of its most iconic attractions. The apartment features an outdoor lounge and spacious interior living areas, appointed with features for cooking and entertainment. Three bedroom suites (two with king beds and one with a queen) accommodate families and groups of friends, up to six in size.The architecture of the Glass House features open-concept layouts on both floors and abundant natural light. A wide vanishing wall opens between the interior living areas and the courtyard lounge, creating an expansive indoor/outdoor space for gatherings or relaxation. Sip Australian wine in the lounge, or kindle a fire on cool evenings and relax with your favorite TV shows. Prepare delicious meals at the barbecue grill or in the fully equipped kitchen, and dine together around the table for six.The kitchen is like a work of fine art unto itself, with a stove and island bar made of green marble. The home is equipped with security, electronic media, and smart home features, including Apple TV and Alexa voice control, and features air conditioning and underfloor heating. Gallery-worthy artwork is displayed in every room.A floating staircase leads to the upper-level bedrooms. All guest suites feature designer headboards, upholstered walls, appointed robes, and ensuite bathrooms.From the villa’s location at 31 Boundary St., in the neighborhood of Paddington, you're about three or four kilometers from Sydney Opera House and the Royal Botanic Gardens, and within easy reach of several famous beaches, including Tamarama, Bondi, and Coogee. Proximity to Sydney Airport makes the Glass House an ideal vacation rental for destination wedding guests or easy weekend escapes.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Base yourself in a setting that’s anything but basic at the spectacular Cardrona Terraces. This one-of-a-kind South Island property pairs Spanish Mission architecture with classic mountain-lodge decor, and the seclusion of 42 private acres of land with a location close to skiing and other outdoor adventure in the Wanaka area. Invite up to twelve guests for a family reunion, a getaway with friends or a holiday spent exploring the gorgeous New Zealand surroundings.Revel in the mountain views from outdoor living areas with a heated pool, al-fresco kitchen and fireplace, a barbecue and dining for twelve. If you’re coming to the area to ski, relax after a day on the slopes with the help of the Sky-equipped TV, wet bar, fireplace and Wi-Fi. There’s also a library if you need to catch up on emails—or just want a quiet moment with a book.This residence has more than 7,500 square feet of living space, giving you the luxury of having everyone together or spreading out to find your own space. The living and dining rooms pair traditional style with playful accents, such as English roll-arm sofas spread with mustard-yellow pillows. And the fully equipped kitchen is a statement of its own, with cherry-red cabinets in a high-impact, high-gloss finish.Each of the six bedrooms at Cardrona Terraces has a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and opens to an outdoor space, whether a private balcony or the courtyard. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms feature an eclectic yet inviting mix of furnishings, colors and textures.Close to both the soothing fields of Wanaka Lavender Farm and the jaw-dropping peaks of Mount Aspiring National Park, this vacation rental offers something for everyone. Find both laid-back shops and restaurants and plenty of outdoor adventures in downtown Wanaka, book either a honeymoon-worthy lake cruise or a heart-pumping jet boat ride, and get out into the mountains on foot, bike or skis.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The vast estate of Villa Atas Ombak includes an acre and a half of gardens and over 100 meters of sandy beachfront, making it easy to see why it earned its name, “villa on top of the waves.” With stylish lounge areas and stunning views, this is one of our grandest Bali villa rentals.In the middle of the villa’s manicured lawn and facing palm trees and the ocean is the in-ground swimming pool, complete with cushioned chaise lounges and sun umbrellas, making this the perfect spot to while away a hot afternoon. In the evening, cozy up with loved ones and settle down on one of the plush sofas to watch a movie in the television room. You can completely relax during your stay here thanks to the services of on-site housekeeping, kitchen and wait staff.You’ll find the main living area in a thatched roof pavilion that’s open on all sides, allowing you to fully enjoy the tropical air. This space features cushioned sofas and chairs, an informal dining table and views overlooking the ocean. If you’d like to try your hand at a home-cooked meal, you’ll find the kitchen fully equipped with restaurant standard appliances.A maximum of 10 guests can comfortably stay overnight in this home’s five bedrooms. Each room includes an en-suite bathroom, king size bed and air conditioning, as well as access to the outdoors. Meanwhile, the spacious master suite opens up to a private plunge pool.If you can peel yourself away from the villa, you’ll find an assortment of well-known restaurants and shops just five minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spend your trip to the Indonesian isle of Bali in sheer luxury at Villa Ramadewa, a three-bedroom home located in the lovely Petitenget district. Villa Ramadewa accommodates up to six individuals of discerning taste and offers an amazing architectural blend incorporating contemporary urbane motifs with traditional Balinese elements. Designed by Dutch architect Joost Van Grieken, this villa has been featured in lifestyle and travel magazines and has become a dream for elite travelers.Villa Ramadewa offers guests a 24/7 butler service, housekeeping and a gourmet chef throughout their stay. Outdoors, there is a large swimming pool surrounded by charming gardens and a stylish furnished terrace with an elegant alfresco dining area. The inside of the home boasts amazing features, such as a dedicated music control room with a centralized iPad-controlled Bose sound system, which is active throughout the building. The house is also awash in premier Apple technology including an iMac, Apple TVs and iPods in every room.The interior of Villa Ramadewa is simply stunning. The huge living pavilion with high-vaulted ceilings feature beautiful antiques and Indonesian cultural artifacts that will leave guests fascinated by the magic of this part of the world. The fully-equipped gourmet kitchen boasts a large breakfast bar and an adjacent temperature-controlled wine room.Guests staying here will find that their en-suite sleeping quarters are immersed in stylish decor. For instance, the master suite located on the second level with a king size bed, provides an Apple TV, sound system, dressing room and even kimonos with slippers. The two ground level bedrooms each have queen size beds, floor-to-ceiling glass doors and ambient mood lighting. The en-suite bathrooms are stunning as they feature elements from the star designer Philippe Starcks’ renowned collection.While Bali is immersed in ancient customs and practices, it is by a far a stranger to the modern world. For those who simply can’t get enough tee time, Nirwana Bali Golf Course is only a short drive away with fantastic fairways – a fun challenge for players of any level. While there, make sure to visit Tanah Lot, the amazing and deeply revered temple that has been built atop a magnificent stone archway high above the sea. Get the vacation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stretch out in a sunbed beneath the shade of the poolside pergola while gazing out over Jimbaran Bay at this Balinese hilltop home. Immerse yourself in lush greenery, mature trees, and fresh sea breeze. Relax as the full-staff caters you your every whim. Then, make your way 7 minutes to the sandy shores of Kedonganan Beach, where you'll find crystal waters and a delicious seafood restaurant.A bright, modern take on Balinese architecture, Villa Adenium shows off the warm wood tones, open-air layout, and integration of water features, for which the style is known. The interior uses cream tones, contemporary furnishings, and high-end electronics to merge the present with the luxuries of simpler times. Notable upgrades include the games room, home gym, media room.Start your mornings with an espresso on the master's balcony, looking out over the sailboats in the bay below. After, join the group at the kitchen's breakfast bar for brunch. Before lunch, head out to the fish market on Kedonganan Beach and pick up something fresh to grill on the barbecue. Later on, challenge a friend to a game of pool, ping pong, or videogames before an alfresco dinner.It's finally time to try surfing. Kuta Beach is a perfect spot for beginners to take lessons. The soft sandy bottom creates some of the best waves on the planet. If you'd like to practice before taking it to the ocean, visit Armada Flow House's wave simulator, it's fun for the whole family. Then, spend the night sipping cocktails and listening to live music on the beach at Bali Beach Shack.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This enchanting villa is situated within steps of Mengening Beach on Bali's southwest coast, near the traditional village of Cemagi. Designed by architect Ernesto Bedmar (renowned for his private homes throughout Southeast Asia), the villa melds timeless Balinese elements with high-end modern comforts in exquisite harmony with the surrounding landscape. Resort-like amenities include two ample swimming pools (including a private pool off the master villa), expansive outdoor living and dining areas, and a fine professional staff, while the 5,900-square-meter estate offers a rare degree of privacy on this coveted coastline near Seminyak. Five private villas and a guest bedroom accommodate twelve guests in all, ideal for family reunions, large groups of friends, and destination wedding guests.The estate overlooks sweeping vistas of the surrounding rice paddies, volcanoes, and ocean, with about 100 types of plants and trees inhabiting its luxuriant gardens. A two-story main pavilion opens to a 25-meter infinite swimming pool, accompanied by elegant lounge chairs and a poolside salon. The gourmet kitchen serves a semi-alfresco dining table, both enjoying expansive vistas. An interior spiral staircase and stunning two-sided exterior staircase lead to the upper-level terrace, featuring an ample covered living area and 360-degree vistas of the landscape and sea.The 170-square meter master villa offers a honey-moon worthy escape for couples, with its own 9-meter infinite pool, furnished terrace, kitchenette, lounge, and deluxe ensuite bathroom. Each of the four guest villas features a private furnished terrace and ensuite bathroom with alfresco shower and tub, providing dreamy privacy for downtime and rest. The guest bedroom includes a king bed and direct access to a bathroom and terrace.A minute's walk from Mengening Beach, Ambalama Villa balances privileged seclusion with proximity to some of the top destinations on Bali. The bustling scene at Seminyak is just fourteen kilometers away, and you're an easy drive to the iconic Tanah Lot Temple, an excellent site for wedding photos or family excursions. Golfers are close to Nirwana Golf Club, and surf pilgrims will want to visit Echo Beach. Cemagi and its surrounding countryside offer a rich taste of traditional Balinese life.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy views of the sea amid lush, tropical gardens at this villa whose name means “high river.” Sitting on over 100 meters of beach frontage, this is one of our top Bali villa rentals. Whether you’re looking for a relaxing vacation, or one filled with adventure, Bali features plenty of natural landscapes to explore, ranging from white sandy beaches to volcanic mountains and lush rain forests.Soak in the sun on one of the lawn chairs in the back yard—they face palm trees, the ocean and a free-form, 18-meter infinity-edge swimming pool. If you’re feeling up for some exercise, go explore the surrounding area on one of the estate’s mountain bikes, or challenge a loved one to a tennis match on one of the shared courts. You can relax afterwards with a massage in the garden balé. To further help you unwind, there are staff on site to take care of the everyday tasks like cooking and cleaning.You’ll find plenty of seating in the open-air living pavilion. It features multiple sofas surrounding a glass-topped coffee table underneath a vaulted, exposed-beam ceiling and offers views of the garden. There’s also a large, Saurwood table for formal dinners as well as a coconut-shell bar for cocktails. Meanwhile, a covered boardwalk takes you into the bright kitchen, fully stocked with modern appliances and plenty of counter space.Up to eight guests can stay the night in this villa’s four bedrooms, making it an ideal getaway for a group of friends or family. All suites offer king size beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, while the master suite also boasts an en-suite garden bathroom with an alfresco shower. Additional bedding is available for an extra cost.Villa Sungai Tinggi is only steps away from the beach where you’ll find some of the island’s best surf. It’s also only 10 km to the restaurants and shops of Seminyak and the renowned greens at the Nirwana Bali Golf Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Just a short leisurely stroll from Bali’s iconic Petitenget Beach, Villa Lilibel is a six-bedroom tropical getaway strategically placed close to all the very best of Bali. This villa is family-friendly and the vast property consists of lush gardens and a multitude of first class features. This luxury home provides up to twelve lucky visitors easy access to the cosmopolitan Seminyak district full of exotic options for shopping, dining and entertainment.Only the finest amenities and creature comforts can be found at Villa Lilibel, starting off with a full staff of eager professionals comprised of a chef, butler, housekeeper and night watchman. The grounds feature a fifty-foot swimming pool tiled in Indian slate, not to mention gardens with varied flora and awe-inspiring stone statues. Indoors, guests will love the spa room from where massages can be ordered as well as the sixty-five inch television, Sonos sound system and Playstation 4 found in the media room.This home is tropical elegance defined, with polished wooden pillars and stone statues adorning rooms contrasted against brightly-colored furniture and fabric in a total open air concept. The spacious main dining room and lounge with soaring grass-thatched ceilings optimize communal and family moments. While there is a chef on staff, guests can help themselves to the modern gourmet kitchen featuring gorgeous design and nearly every conceivable appliance.The six en-suite bedrooms are split evenly across the two floors of the villa, with a choice of bedding options that include either king size or two twin size beds. The beds are dressed in stylish linens and duvets and the suites are chic and contemporary. Ground floor suites access the patio, except the master suite which leads directly to the courtyard.Villa Lilibel’s ideal location is simply extraordinary, as it is situated near countless attractions and varied sites that will appeal to everyone’s tastes and interests. For gourmands and epicureans, only a jaunt away is Seminyak Square, replete with delicious Indonesian and international cuisines. Culture aficionados will be glad to know that the Petitenget Temple and Tanah Lot are only a short drive away, providing dazzling insights into the island’s amazing spiritual customs and history.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The magnificent Seseh Beach Villa II is located in a peaceful rural village on Bali’s southwestern coast overlooking the Indian Ocean. This Indonesian island represents a banquet for the mind, body and soul. Though relatively small, Bali offers the natural beauty of oceans, volcanic mountains and verdant rain forests while showcasing both ancient and modern culture, including some extraordinary cuisine.Outdoors, the sun loungers and sun beds invite relaxation while taking in the oceanfront. Enjoy casual lunches and tropical evening meals in the covered dining pavilion, followed by a stroll down to the beach. This private vacation rental is also loaded with perks. The PlayStation, Wii and Xbox along with a 60-inch smart TV will keep both the children and “big kids” amused on the rare rainy day. You will be looked after by a full time manager, butler, 24-hour security and a personal chef.The interior of this villa features large, air conditioned, open plan living spaces. The furnishings are smart and contemporary, with a subtle nod to retro design. Large windows and openings foster a seamless indoor/outdoor living experience. The glamorous wet bar may soon become the favorite haunt of the consummate entertainer in your entourage.At night, enjoy air conditioned comfort, or slide back the French doors and let the sea breeze cool your bedroom as you fall asleep to the soothing sounds of the ocean waves. With a total of six luxury bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, Seseh Beach Villa II can accommodate up to fourteen guests. The villa provides a variety of sleeping arrangements so there is something for everyone. It’s perfect for a multigenerational family holiday!Stroll through the village and meet the friendly locals as they go about their daily work and religious devotion, giving you an authentic glimpse into the lives of the people who make this island so warm and welcoming. For those who wish to venture further afield, a car and driver is on standby. Explore the island or indulge in Seminyak’s trendy restaurants, bars and shops. Or perhaps you’re craving a round at the Nirwana Bali Golf Course? Weddings and events are a villa specialty, with the spacious garden and swimming pool providing the perfect setting for your special day!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
