listing.listing_description: This extraordinary luxury villa on the island of Bali is located near Jimbaran Hill, just minutes from Padang Beach. Featuring beautiful alfresco living areas around a spectacular fresh-water swimming pool, along with exquisite interiors and five deluxe bedroom suites accommodating ten, Villa Una Nina is ideal for family reunions, destination wedding guests, or groups of friends. The vacation rental includes cook service, housekeeping, security, and a villa manager.Surrounded by lush tropical gardens and featuring an ample terrace and lawn, the villa is perfect for special events, memorable receptions, or merely luxuriating in the South Pacific sun. Enjoy lovely days floating in the crystalline pool and relaxing on elegant sun loungers. Relish an alfresco lunch in the gorgeous dining pavilion, and sip afternoon cocktails in the lounge. The ample balcony on the villa's upper level is also beautifully furnished and features gorgeous views of the countryside.Lovely doors join the pool terrace with the villa's cool, elegant interior, creating a lovely flow of space and air. Sip wine in the sumptuous living room, and gather in the dining room for an epic South East Asian feast. At night, watch your favorite shows and movies in the lounge and play a game of pool at the billiard table. The villa includes a fully equipped kitchen as well as a second-floor office space. The exquisite décor is at once elegant and naturalistic, with tasteful furnishings and artwork evoking Bali's cultural heritage and natural beauty.The exquisite bedroom suites provide each guest or couple a dreamy private setting for downtime and rest. The master suite opens to a private garden with hammock, and features a canopied queen bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and an exquisite tub of terrazzo stone. Three of the guest suites have queen beds as well and share access to the balcony, while the fourth guestroom has two twin-size beds (convertible into a queen). All of the bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms.Villa Uma Nina enjoys a fantastic inland location on the southernmost peninsula of Bali, with world-class beaches within minutes in every direction, including Padang Beach, Jimbaran Beach, and Geger Beach. The towns of Kuta and Seminyak are also an easy drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Disconnect for a while at this airy riverside villa overlooking the rice paddies of Canggu. Start your day with a yoga session in the open-sided studio beside a Balinese temple. Sip your morning tea while you wander the lush gardens. And, relax even further with the help of the full-time staff. When you’re ready to explore, start with a tour of Tanah Lot Temple, less than 10km from home.Balinese architecture strikes the perfect balance between seclusion and social space. At the compound-style estate’s center, the refreshing swimming pool acts as a meeting place, connecting the standalone suites and main house. Inspect Hansa’s interior, and you’ll find an inspiring mix of local artifacts and cutting-edge tech features. There’s also a cozy media room if you want to catch up on some TV.After the private chef has served dinner at the alfresco table, challenge a friend to a game of billiards beneath the shingle-roof bale or stop by the wet bar for a cocktail to sip in the riverside lounge. In the afternoon, pick a sunny spot to work on your tan from a poolside lounge chair. And for a little extra relaxation, book yourself a massage or see about an in-house spa treatment.When it’s time to hit the beach, you won’t be disappointed along the Canggu coast. This area is known for its black-sand beaches, which is a result of ancient volcanic activity. The coast is also world-famous among the surfing elite, so if you’re interested in a lesson, this is a perfect opportunity. For a night out, visit the beachfront party at Finn’s Recreation Club and sip tropical cocktails while you dance under the moonlight.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
